column1: | Barassie Junction                               |                                           |        |
| Adjustments to Sectional Running Times          |                                           |        |
| Movement Up                                     | Reason                                    | Value  |
| Up Freight train from Barassie Yard towards     | Acceleration                              | 21⁄2*  |
| Irvine or Kilmarnock                            |                                           |        |
| Up Goods train from Barassie UGL towards        | Acceleration                              | 11⁄2*  |
| Irvine, Kilmarnock or Caledonian Paper          |                                           |        |
| Movement Down                                   | Traction                                  | Value  |
| Down train from Irvine to DPL                   | Approach control                          | 11⁄2   |
| Down train from single line not stopping in DPL | Passenger and freight trailing up to 400t | 1⁄2*   |
| or at Troon (acceleration)                      | (TR30)                                    |        |
|                                                 | Trailing 600t to 1000t (TR35 to TR50)     | 1*     |
|                                                 | Trailing >=1200t (above TR55)             | 11⁄2*  |
| *To be applied approaching next timing point    |                                           |        |
| Junction Margins                                |                                           |        |
| First Movement                                  | Second Movement                           | Margin |
